```{r}
sim_test <- function(number) {
  length <- 0
  while(number !=1){
    if(number%%2 ==0) {
    number<- number/2
    print(number)
    length <- length +1
  }
  else if(number %%2 !=0) {
    number <- (number*3)+1
    print(number)
    length <- length + 1
  }
  }
  length
}
```

```{r}
sim_test(3)
```
